items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm, Comfortable, Beautiful, Good Quality, Good Fit
items.body: Love the color (Ykneearmygreen). Was originally tentative about ordering the green. Seemed like it might be a little too bright, but it is a very beautiful darkish green (olive like). The dress fits great. It is made of heavier material, so you can't see through it and it is very warm. At the same time, it also doesn't feel smothering on, nor look or feel bulky. It is very comfortable to wear, almost like PJ's, and has a very classy, yet sexy look. It can be dressed up for a nice date night or an outside fall wedding. It can be dressed down (in terms of sexy) with a nice scarf for work events. The cowl neck is not tight in anyway shape or form around the neck (normally I hate material around my neck). I am very happy with this purchase and would feel comfortable buying another dress from this brand. A few things to note about dress fitting and sizing: * If you are flat chested like me (A cup), a bra that gives a little boost in that area helps for the fit to look good, but I wouldn't exactly say necessary. * For help with sizing: I am 5'6" and fluctuate between 128-134 lbs. I have a small chest (loose measurement ~32"), skinny waist (loose measurement ~26.5"), big behind for my body (loose measurement ~37.75"). I ordered a Size 8 and it fit perfectly Read more
items.author: athalia

items.body: Beautiful cut with very soft fabric. Fitted without being overly revealing. Looks much more expensive than it is. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress but...had a scent
items.body: The dress is soft, comfy & beautiful just like the photo, so Im EXCITED to wear it. It's not getting a 5-star bc the scent of a lady's perfume is in it, so I need to WASH IT first! :( Not happy about this, but I would purchase another dress in a different color. Read more
items.author: C. Goode

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect winter black dress
items.body: This is that perfect winter black sweater dress. Wore it out for an evening in the city with some low dramatic makeup and dressy earrings and some great shoes. It dresses up and down really easily. The length is perfect for day or night. Can be worn to the office easily with higher boots and casual makeup and hoops. Love the way it fits. Washes and dries well. Shape held up well with washing and drying. Great purchase. Travel must have in the winter. Read more
items.author: Maggie (The Librarianâ€™s Daughter)

items.body: It was cute, and very bright! Read more
items.author: Lorie K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lady in Red!
items.body: I ordered this dress in red and it is a nice colored red. Slightly blue based so not the orangey red but not too deep of a red. It was exactly what I was looking for! The knit is thick and comfortable sweater dress! The arms were a little long but I like it! Perfect for a festive holiday dinner! I am 5-4 120lbs with 34DD girlies and ordered a size small. The length was great at just below the knees. Iâ€™m thinking about getting it in black as well. Read more
items.author: Calhitex

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality
items.body: Need to return. No comfort fit Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A Olive, A White, A Khaki, A Lilac, A Dark Green, A Beige, A Black, A Light Blue, A Purple, A Navy, Berry, A Dark Grey, Coffee, Palatinate Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
